name: No Step On Hyoomins
description:
You were sitting in your living room, playing a video game and minding your own business until you accidentally ate a RADIOACTIVE CHEETO. Now you are 500 feet tall and must get out of the city while causing as little carnage as possible.

This is a Ludum Dare #38 game jam entry.

Timelapse Video - The making of!

Postmortem - blog talking about my experience

Resources used:

Character Sprites by pondomaniac

Tilemap by James Arndt

Blood Splats by PWL

Speech Bubbles by okyoGeisha

Phaser Game Engine
